title: Angel Correa scores cracking winner for Atletico in win over Valencia
description: Angel Correa opened the scoring for Atletico Madrid against Valencia with a  wonderful long-range effort.
content:
Picking the ball up with his back to goal around 40 yards out, Correa took two touches before unleashing an unstoppable effort into the top right corner.
It proved to be the only goal of the game, with Atletico holding on for a vital 1-0 victory at the Wanda Metropolitano, meaning Diego Simeone's side closed the gap at the top of La Liga to nine points.
Atletico have also opened up a nine-point lead on third-place Valencia, and sit 10 ahead of their rivals Real Madrid.
Barcelona, the league leaders, drew 1-1 at city neighbours Espanyol earlier on Sunday, with Gerard Pique netting a late leveller.
Watch Correa's goal in the video above
